content.data: Many are absorbed in meditation on that stable and vice less Lord, Who is Supreme and praiseworthy, Whose glory is Unique, Who is cognition-incarnate and Lightt-incarnate, Whose Splendour is unmanifested and Who is Unattached.161.
(ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦਾ) ਤੇਜ ਪ੍ਰਗਟਾਇਆ ਨਹੀਂ ਜਾ ਸਕਦਾ ਅਤੇ ਰਾਤ ਦਿਨ ਉਦਾਸ ਰਹਿੰਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੧੬੧॥
